jobDescription: Sunrise System Inc. is currently looking for Data Analyst in Summit, NJ with one of our top client. Job Title: Data Analyst Job Id: 18-09453 Location: Summit, NJ 07901 Duration: 5 months PositionType: Hourly contract Position (W2 only) Business Analyst detailsAbility to review data from disparate sources, identify commonalities and pull together a single reportable data source for reporting.Then present the summary of this information in a meaningful way via a PowerPoint presentation.Works independently across all IT functions to create, socialize and execute processes to manage data bases to ensure IT management visibility and appropriate analysis is available.Identifies exceptions and highlights impact on decisions.Knows overall IT purpose and how data supports management's needs and decision making.Leverages tools available and creates templates where needed.The resource should have strong written and communication skills.PowerPoint, Excel and Microsoft Word are critical tools for the resource to be an expert in.Data visualization tools such as PowerBi, Tableau, and Pivot Charts are a plus.The individual will be creating communications and working with various C level & IT leaders on messaging for the group.Additionally, the resource will be a go to contact for first level support on the configuration and processes around the tools and processes that the group supports.Experience with Project Management, Agile and related best practices is a plus.Knowledge of EA, ITSM, IT Benchmarking, Project Portfolio Management and/or Application Portfolio Management are a plus.Contact Sunny Rajput  Direct: (732) 272 0302 | Email: [Click Here to Email Your Resumé]  Or  Sourabh Agrawal | Lead - Talent Acquisition  Direct: (732) 272 0301| Email: [Click Here to Email Your Resumé]
